item.title: By: Lenka
item.dc:creator: Lenka
item.description: Hi Alan! What would you recommend to do if I have my *spec.ts files inside Angular components? How can I ask Jasmine in jasmine.yml to point and run these files as well. And can Jasmine even run Typescript files or do I need some gem/plugin to compile .ts to .js? I'm asking because I'm using wild combination of Rails+Angular6 and I would love to do Unit Tests inside my Component files
item.content:encoded:
Hi Alan! What would you recommend to do if I have my *spec.ts files inside Angular components? How can I ask Jasmine in jasmine.yml to point and run these files as well. And can Jasmine even run Typescript files or do I need some gem/plugin to compile .ts to .js?
I’m asking because I’m using wild combination of Rails+Angular6 and I would love to do Unit Tests inside my Component files
